name: Video Craps
overview: Dice/gambling game for the C128 only. Included in Loadstar 128 #20. It works in 80-columns mode. Video craps is a one-player game of chance, loosely based on the popular Las Vegas casino game. You start with a $5000 bankroll. You can bet from $2 to $2000 on any individual bet. Before you can roll the dice, you must place a bet on the pass line or don't pass, press p or d, enter an amount from 2-2000, and press return. You will then have the option to bet or roll. If you wish to, you can make additional bets.
